mapper.select:
select * from( select t.*, rownum rn from ( SELECT r.r_id, r.bno, r.reply, TO_CHAR(r.regitDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS regitDate, r.updateDate, m.nickname FROM reply r JOIN board b ON r.bno = b.bno JOIN member m ON b.m_Id = m.m_Id WHERE r.bno = #{bno} ORDER BY r.r_id DESC
) t ) where rn between #{cri.startNo} and #{cri.endNo}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (r_id, bno, reply, replyer,replydate) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer},sysdate)
